faq.stayInLoop: Stay noted for upcoming updates and chase some bounty rewards.
faq.WhatIsHappeningHereParams: SlotStat is a data driven platform, where users can observe fact-based statistics of casinos and slots. Stats are attained through our algorithms or spared by the casino itself.
faq.WhatIsHappeningHereEnd: cThose parameters may defer by casinos, providers and/or games.
faq.WhatIsSlotstatContent: SlotStat is a peaceful bystander of the gambling industry that monitors stats of slot games and brings better gambling experience to players by equipping them with key functions like RTP, RTP Swing, Win Spin Regular, bonuses and JACKPOT.
faq.WhatsHitRateContent: Win Spin Regular is a frequency of winning spins, where win is higher than initial bet and represents the calculable constant number.
faq.WhatIsRTPContent: RTP as a return to player constant number is a general, ideal point of slot game algorithm and may vary from provider to provider even within one casino.
faq.fluctuationContent: RTP SWING real-time tool shows slot game’s fluctuation towards its own ideal RTP at a very exact moment of present.

table.sourceHint: Information source of statistics. 1. Casino API - 2. Slotstat AI - 3. Verified -
table.jackpotHint: Figurine is an actively updating maximum Jackpot value of the chosen casino and may pop up as an accurate periscope for sharp shot takers.
table.userHint: Number of users who monitor statistics
table.casinoBonusHint: Casino: SlotStat partner casinos sprawl on the list with authorization hallmarks. Verification badge holder casinos real-time stats are 100% legit and perfectly spot on. ________________ Bonus: Players from SlotStat interface to chosen casino will get exclusive offers and rare bonuses.
table.h1GameHint: Figurine shows the percentage of winning spins frequency in the last hour time period.
table.h24GameHint: Figurine shows the percentage of winning spins frequency in the last 24 hour time period.
table.RTPhint: RTP Swing parameter shows the game’s variance from the ideal RTP in real-time period.
table.playHint: Play button directly sends the player to the selected slot on the chosen casino interface. Via the Play button SlotStat keeps tabs on player preferences and improves its mechanism based on this information.

gamePage.Win-spinRateHint: Win Spin Regular is mathematically calculable quantity and expresses a frequency of winning spins, where win is higher than initial bet.

noStatistic: Oops, we will update statistics soon!!

notification.cookieText: By clicking “Accept All Cookies”, you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in your marketing efforts.

RTP.provideInfo: We will provide RTP Information soon

chartComponent.RTPhint: RTP is a return to player constant number of slot game algorithm toward which the slot continuously aspires and may vary from provider to provider even within one casino. While RTP Swing figurine follows the trace of slot in real-time and shows variance from game's ideal RTP on live based on tracked information.
